tei:classSpec.tei:desc: This attribute class supplies the xml:id attribute.

tei:attDef.tei:desc: This provides a unique identifier for the element bearing the attribute.

tei:remarks.tei:p: The xml:id attribute may be used to specify a canonical reference for an element. The value of this attribute is always understood to be a single token, even if it contains space or other punctuation characters, and need not be composed of numbers only.
